TESTING 
library(ocedata)
library(oce)
par(mar=rep(0.5, 4))
data(endeavour)
mapPlot(coastlineWorld, type='l', proj='mollweide', fill='gray')
mapPoints(endeavour$longitude, endeavour$latitude, pch=20, col='red')
